source.value: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 78

description.value:
Requirements The bugaboo has killed a creature within the last round and is adjacent to the creature;
Effect The bugaboo consumes the creature's soul. The soul is utterly destroyedâ€”nothing short of wish or a similar effect can restore it to life, and only after the bugaboo has been slain. The bugaboo regains Hit Points equal to double the level of the consumed creature. After devouring six souls within a year, a bugaboo transforms into a bogeyman.
When the bugaboo uses a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger.
The bugaboo deals [[/r 1d6 # extra precision damage]] extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

If a bugaboo scores a critical hit with a claw Strike, the target must attempt a DC 24 Will save.
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is frightened 1.
Failure The target is frightened 2.
Critical Failure The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.
On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are flat-footed to the bugaboo.

You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 3 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened You can target up to five creatures.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} 1.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Heightened You can target up to 10 creatures.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You make the target easier to open. Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting knock, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

Knock counteracts lock.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You canâ€™t create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened The range increases to 120 feet.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you.

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

Heightened The spell's range increases to 500 feet.
description.label: Description
